result.eng: The men spent their lives mining coal.

result.html: Chaith na fir a saol ag baint guailThe men spent their lives mining coal.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ na fir a saol ag baint guailThe men spent their lives mining coal.

result.eng: Are you happy in your life?
result.ga: An bhfuil tú sásta i do shaol
result.orig: An bhfuil tú sásta i do shaol
result.html: An bhfuil tú sásta i do shaolAre you happy in your life?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil tú sásta i do ẛaolAre you happy in your life?

result.eng: Do you use Irish in your daily life?

result.ponchtml: An mbaineann tú úsáid as an Ġaeilge i do ẛaol laeṫúilDo you use Irish in your daily life?

result.eng: Did she have a long life?
result.ga: An raibh saol fada aici
result.orig: An raibh saol fada aici
result.html: An raibh saol fada aiciDid she have a long life?
result.ponchtml: An raiḃ saol fada aiciDid she have a long life?

result.eng: Life as it was a long time ago.
result.ga: An saol mar a bhí fadó

result.html: An saol mar a bhí fadóLife as it was a long time ago.
result.ponchtml: An saol mar a ḃí fadóLife as it was a long time ago.

result.eng: Now that the product exists, we must start marketing it.
result.ga: Anois agus an táirge ar an saol caithfidh muid tabhairt faoin mhargaíocht

result.eng: Life was different then in the sense that we didn't have modern-day facilities.
result.ga: Bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againn
result.orig: Bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againn

result.ponchtml: Ḃí an saol difriúil ag an am sa ṁéid naċ raiḃ áiseanna na linne seo againnLife was different then in the sense that we didn't have modern-day facilities.

result.eng: They were kissing in broad daylight.
result.ga: Bhí siad ag pógadh a chéile os comhair an tsaoil
result.orig: Bhí siad ag pógadh a chéile os comhair an tsaoil
result.html: Bhí siad ag pógadh a chéile os comhair an tsaoilThey were kissing in broad daylight.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag pógaḋ a ċéile os coṁair an tsaoilThey were kissing in broad daylight.

result.eng: Healthy people have sport as an intergral part of their lives.

result.eng: What did you do during your life until now?

result.eng: She spent her whole life doing that work.

result.ponchtml: Gearraḋ príosún saoil airHe was sentenced to lifetime imprisonment.

result.eng: When I came to the world.
result.ga: Nuair a tháinig mé ar an saol

result.html: Nuair a tháinig mé ar an saolWhen I came to the world.
result.ponchtml: Nuair a ṫáinig mé ar an saolWhen I came to the world.

result.eng: I don't believe in the other world.
result.ga: Ní chreidim ar an saol eile

result.html: Ní chreidim ar an saol eileI don't believe in the other world.
result.ponchtml: Ní ċreidim ar an saol eileI don't believe in the other world.

result.eng: After all, he is a politician, it is his job.
result.ga: Tar éis an tsaoil is polaiteoir é is é a jab é

result.eng: The whole world knows who you are.
result.ga: Tá a fhios ag an saol mór cé tusa
result.orig: Tá a fhios ag an saol mór cé tusa
result.html: Tá a fhios ag an saol mór cé tusaThe whole world knows who you are.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ḟios ag an saol mór cé tusaThe whole world knows who you are.

result.eng: The ordinary world is too ugly compared to the world of literature.
result.ga: Tá an gnáthshaol róghránna i gcomparáid le saol na litríochta
result.orig: Tá an gnáthshaol róghránna i gcomparáid le saol na litríochta

result.eng: Sport is more visible nowadays thanks to the media.
result.ga: Tá an spórt níos feiceálaí ar na saolta seo a bhuí leis na meáin
result.orig: Tá an spórt níos feiceálaí ar na saolta seo a bhuí leis na meáin

result.eng: I was thinking, I'd love to go to the party after all.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag cuimhneamh ba bhreá liom a dhul chuig an gcóisir tar éis an tsaoil
result.orig: Bhí mé ag cuimhneamh ba bhreá liom a dhul chuig an gcóisir tar éis an tsaoil

result.eng: You have a great life!
result.ga: Tá saol iontach agat
result.orig: Tá saol iontach agat
result.html: Tá saol iontach agatYou have a great life!
result.ponchtml: Tá saol iontaċ agatYou have a great life!

result.eng: The life of an ordinary worker was nothing to be proud of.
result.ga: Níorbh aon ghaisce ná údar mórtais saol an ghnáthoibrí
result.orig: Níorbh aon ghaisce ná údar mórtais saol an ghnáthoibrí

result.eng: Her life is falling apart.
result.ga: Tá a saol ag titim as a chéile

result.html: Tá a saol ag titim as a chéileHer life is falling apart.
result.ponchtml: Tá a saol ag titim as a ċéileHer life is falling apart.

result.eng: She thought punctuality didn't suit the American Indian perspective on life.
result.ga: Shíl sí nár thit poncúlacht isteach le dearcadh saoil na Meiriceánach Dúchasach
result.orig: Shíl sí nár thit poncúlacht isteach le dearcadh saoil na Meiriceánach Dúchasach

result.eng: She was very active in the world of journalism in New York City.
result.ga: Bhí sí an-ghníomhach i saol na hiriseoireachta i gCathair Nua-Eabhrac
result.orig: Bhí sí an-ghníomhach i saol na hiriseoireachta i gCathair Nua-Eabhrac

result.eng: In the dark world of espionage, you cannot be sure of anything.
result.ga: I saol dorcha na spiaireachta ní féidir bheith cinnte de rud ar bith
result.orig: I saol dorcha na spiaireachta ní féidir bheith cinnte de rud ar bith

result.ponchtml: I saol dorċa na spiaireaċta ní féidir ḃeiṫ cinnte de rud ar biṫIn the dark world of espionage, you cannot be sure of anything.

result.eng: It was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.
result.ga: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighis
result.orig: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighis
result.html: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighisIt was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ aon ionaḋ gurḃ é an saol acadúil a ḃí i ndán don ḃuaċaill óg agus a ṁáṫair ina doċtúir leiġisIt was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.

result.eng: They were a considerable list once [ie. there were a lot of them].
result.ga: Liosta le háireamh a bhí iontu tráth den saol
result.orig: Liosta le háireamh a bhí iontu tráth den saol
result.html: Liosta le háireamh a bhí iontu tráth den saolThey were a considerable list once [ie. there were a lot of them].
result.ponchtml: Liosta le háireaṁ a ḃí iontu tráṫ den saolThey were a considerable list once [ie. there were a lot of them].

result.eng: In addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ga: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.orig: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.html: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ponchtml: Anuas ar sin ní ṫig éalú ó ġnáṫċúraimí an tsaoil a ṫiteann ar ḋuine ar nós airgead a ṫuilleaṁ nó clann a ṫógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.

result.eng: It was said that he was well-off.
result.ga: Bhí iomrá go raibh sé ina sháith den tsaol
result.orig: Bhí iomrá go raibh sé ina sháith den tsaol
result.html: Bhí iomrá go raibh sé ina sháith den tsaolIt was said that he was well-off.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí iomrá go raiḃ sé ina ẛáiṫ den tsaolIt was said that he was well-off.

result.eng: Long as my life may have been, whatever remains of it will be short.
result.ga: Is gairid mo shaol feasta dá fhadacht é
result.orig: Is gairid mo shaol feasta dá fhadacht é
result.html: Is gairid mo shaol feasta dá fhadacht éLong as my life may have been, whatever remains of it will be short.
result.ponchtml: Is gairid mo ẛaol feasta dá ḟadaċt éLong as my life may have been, whatever remains of it will be short.

result.eng: As soon as one grows up, the fun is over.
result.ga: Aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoil
result.orig: Aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoil
result.html: Aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoilAs soon as one grows up, the fun is over.
result.ponchtml: Aon uair aṁáin a ġeiḃ duine ciall tá deireaḋ aige le haoiḃneas an tsaoilAs soon as one grows up, the fun is over.

result.eng: Life was getting hard for them.
result.ga: Bhí an saol ag cur cruaidh orthu
result.orig: Bhí an saol ag cur cruaidh orthu
result.html: Bhí an saol ag cur cruaidh orthuLife was getting hard for them.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an saol ag cur cruaiḋ orṫuLife was getting hard for them.

result.eng: This must be the end of the world.
result.ga: Caithfidh sé go bhfuil deireadh an tsaoil ann
result.orig: Caithfidh sé go bhfuil deireadh an tsaoil ann
result.html: Caithfidh sé go bhfuil deireadh an tsaoil annThis must be the end of the world.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ sé go ḃfuil deireaḋ an tsaoil annThis must be the end of the world.

result.eng: All you need to care aboit in this world is to steal in a way the law allows.
result.ga: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo ach goid de réir dlí
result.orig: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo ach goid de réir dlí
result.html: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo ach goid de réir dlíAll you need to care aboit in this world is to steal in a way the law allows.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo aċ goid de réir dlíAll you need to care aboit in this world is to steal in a way the law allows.

result.eng: If only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
result.ga: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith mé
result.orig: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith mé
result.html: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith méIf only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
result.ponchtml: Mo ċreaċ agus mo ċrá gan mé ċoṁ hóg leatsa inniu Ċaiṫfinn saol nár ċaiṫ méIf only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.

result.eng: When everybody was asleep...
result.ga: Nuair a bheadh an saol fá chónaí
result.orig: Nuair a bheadh an saol fá chónaí
result.html: Nuair a bheadh an saol fá chónaíWhen everybody was asleep...
result.ponchtml: Nuair a ḃeaḋ an saol fá ċónaíWhen everybody was asleep...

result.eng: He felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.
result.ga: Bhí truaigh an tsaoil aige do Mhicheál Dubh agus don bhail a chuir an bhantracht air
result.orig: Bhí truaigh an tsaoil aige do Mhicheál Dubh agus don bhail a chuir an bhantracht air
result.html: Bhí truaigh an tsaoil aige do Mhicheál Dubh agus don bhail a chuir an bhantracht airHe felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí truaiġ an tsaoil aige do Ṁiċeál Duḃ agus don ḃail a ċuir an ḃantraċt airHe felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.

result.eng: I don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ga: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaol
result.orig: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaol
result.html: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaolI don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ponchtml: Níl feiḋm orm aon lá oibre a ḋéanaṁ le mo ẛolas Tá mé i mo ẛáiṫ den tsaolI don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.

result.eng: The Irish are usually very friendly.
result.ga: Bíonn na hÉireannaigh an-chairdiúil de ghnáth
result.orig: Bíonn na hÉireannaigh an-chairdiúil de ghnáth
result.html: Bíonn na hÉireannaigh an-chairdiúil de ghnáthThe Irish are usually very friendly.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn na hÉireannaiġ an-ċairdiúil de ġnáṫThe Irish are usually very friendly.

result.eng: She prepared breakfast as she usually did.
result.ga: D'ullmhaigh sí bricfeasta mar ba ghnáth léi
result.orig: D'ullmhaigh sí bricfeasta mar ba ghnáth léi
result.html: D'ullmhaigh sí bricfeasta mar ba ghnáth léiShe prepared breakfast as she usually did.
result.ponchtml: D'ullṁaiġ sí bricfeasta mar ba ġnáṫ léiShe prepared breakfast as she usually did.

result.eng: It's normal.
result.ga: Is gnáthrud é
result.orig: Is gnáthrud é
result.html: Is gnáthrud éIt's normal.
result.ponchtml: Is gnáṫrud éIt's normal.

result.eng: We are recycling cans and bottles, as well as ordinary rubbish.
result.ga: Tá muid ag athchúrsáil cannaí agus buidéal chomh maith le gnáthbhruscar

result.eng: I usually wake at six o'clock.
result.ga: Éirím ag a sé a chlog de ghnáth
result.orig: Éirím ag a sé a chlog de ghnáth
result.html: Éirím ag a sé a chlog de ghnáthI usually wake at six o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Éirím ag a sé a ċlog de ġnáṫI usually wake at six o'clock.

result.eng: In the usual place, I guess.

result.html: Sa ghnáth-áit is dóchaIn the usual place, I guess.
result.ponchtml: Sa ġnáṫ-áit is dóċaIn the usual place, I guess.

result.eng: What do you usually do at the weekend?

result.eng: I usually stay in Monday night, watching TV.

result.eng: When do you usually play golf?

result.eng: I usually go for long walks at the weekend; I love being out in the open air.
result.ga: Téim ar shiúlóidí fada de ghnáth ag an deireadh seachtaine is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aer
result.orig: Téim ar shiúlóidí fada de ghnáth ag an deireadh seachtaine is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aer
result.html: Téim ar shiúlóidí fada de ghnáth ag an deireadh seachtaine is breá liom bheith amuigh faoin aerI usually go for long walks at the weekend; I love being out in the open air.
result.ponchtml: Téim ar ẛiúlóidí fada de ġnáṫ ag an deireaḋ seaċtaine is breá liom ḃeiṫ amuiġ faoin aerI usually go for long walks at the weekend; I love being out in the open air.

result.eng: What time do you usually get up?

result.eng: I usually go to a concert or a music session.
result.ga: Téim chuig ceolchoirm nó chuig seisiún ceoil de ghnáth

result.ponchtml: Téim ċuig ceolċoirm nó ċuig seisiún ceoil de ġnáṫI usually go to a concert or a music session.

result.eng: Do you usually leave work at five?

result.eng: Many ordinary people have a gun in their possession.
